# Artigo 1 - Fun√ß√µes Logar√≠tmicas

As fun√ß√µes logar√≠tmicas t√™m a forma geral:

$$
f(x) = \log_b(x)
$$

## Exemplo com base 10 e base e

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x_vals = np.linspace(0.1, 10, 200)
log10_vals = np.log10(x_vals)
loge_vals = np.log(x_vals)

plt.plot(x_vals, log10_vals, label='log‚ÇÅ‚ÇÄ(x)')
plt.plot(x_vals, loge_vals, label='ln(x)', linestyle='--')
plt.title("Fun√ß√µes Logar√≠tmicas")
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("f(x)")
plt.grid(True)
plt.legend()
plt.show()
```
